name: groupexpander
description: WhatsApp group expanding to bypass WhatsApp's limit.

scripts.add-commit: git add images/release.png package.json package-lock.json CHANGELOG.md && git commit -m "Release %npm_config_addver%"
scripts.release: npm version --no-git-tag-version %npm_config_newver% && auto-changelog --template changelog-template.hbs -p -u --commit-limit false && npm run release-image && npm run add-commit --addver=%npm_config_newver% && git tag -a %npm_config_newver% -m "%npm_config_newver%"

author: Eyal Michon
